Uses of Class
Controller

  • Uses of Controller in <Unnamed>

    Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type Controller 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static javafx.scene.layout.GridPane View.drawGrid​(Controller con, boolean drawInactiveTiles)
    Creates the GridPane representing the garden based on the GardenPlot in Model, drawing in inactive tiles if the grid is to be used in the design mode or removing the inactive tiles if the grid is to be used in the final view or season view.
    Constructors in <Unnamed> with parameters of type Controller 
    Constructor Description
    ChooseTemplate​(Controller c, javafx.stage.Stage s)
    Constructor for ChooseTemplate that creates Buttons for choosing the shape of the garden and puts them on a new Scene.
    DesignGarden​(Controller controller, javafx.stage.Stage s)  
    Exit​(Controller c)
    Constructor for the Exit Screen.
    FinalView​(Controller controller, javafx.stage.Stage s)
    The constructor of FinalView
    MainMenu​(Controller c, javafx.stage.Stage s)
    Constructor for the Main Menu that creates new Buttons for creating or loading a garden and the background Image for the window, then creates a new Scene containing these components and sets the given Stage with it.
    Preferences​(Controller controller, javafx.stage.Stage theStage)
    Constructor for preferences takes in a controller and stage
    Recommendations​(Controller controller)
    Constructor for the recommendations class.
    SeasonView​(Controller controller)
    Basic default constructor for the SeasonView when trying to be created by any other class
